snippet: In “The Last Days on Mars,” hours before a six-month research mission is about to end, an exhausted crew is about to head home until a startling discovery.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie The Last Days on Mars, directed by Ruairi Robinson and starring Liev Schreiber.
lead_paragraph: In “The Last Days on Mars,” hours before a six-month research mission is about to end, an exhausted crew is about to head home until a startling discovery.

headline.print_headline: Mars Mission Is Uneventful Till the Undead Feel Unwell
headline.seo: ‘The Last Days on Mars’ Was Adapted From ‘The Animators’
headline.main: Mars Mission Is Uneventful Till the Undead Feel Unwell
headline.kicker: Movie Review | ‘The Last Days on Mars’
